§ 1862f. Research center consortia In Foundation programs making grants to research centers, the Director shall encourage the formation of consortia that include research universities, two-year and four-year colleges, and the private sector. (Pub. L. 100–570, title I, § 110, Oct. 31, 1988, 102 Stat. 2869.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was enacted as part of the National Science Foundation Authorization Act of 1988, and not as part of the National Science Foundation Act of 1950 which comprises this chapter.
